title: Josef Hrubeš
text: Josef Hrubeš (born September 26, 1916, date of death unknown) was a Czechoslovak <a href="Boxing">boxer</a> who competed in the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a> for <a href="Czechoslovakia">Czechoslovakia</a>. He was born in <a href="Slan%C3%BD">Slaný</a>. In 1936 he was eliminated in the quarter-finals of the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201936%20Summer%20Olympics%20-%20Men%27s%20middleweight">middleweight class</a> after losing his fight to the upcoming gold medalist <a href="Jean%20Despeaux">Jean Despeaux</a>.
